sections.text:
30-127.Simultaneous death; sections, how construed.

Sections 30-121 to 30-128 shall be so construed and interpreted as to effectuate their general purpose to make uniform the law in those states which enact them.

SourceLaws 1947, c. 112, ยง 7, p. 306.

sections.heading: 30-121 to 30-128 shall be so construed and interpreted as to effectuate their general purpose to make uniform the law in those states which enact them
